Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 58 (47) with the help of seven fours and three sixes
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka picked three wickets each
India were bundled out for 230 in 47.5 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game ended in a tie
Others: The match was played at R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo
India chased down the total in 47.5 overs
